author: Robb Collins
description: This rum-laced cocktail has attractive savoury flavours with a tangy sourness and floral elderflower.
name: Mariposa
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker and then muddle basil leaves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
